I've gone commercial. Kinda. I just bought jamesward.com and it is now my primary domain name instead of jamesward.org. I liked the .org URL but it's a less familiar URL to non-geeks. You say .com and everyone knows what you mean. The .org will still work - redirects right to here. So I'm a sell-out. Gone .com. Good news is that you still won't see any ads on my site. Let me know if you have any problems with the new domain.
